p: In human beings, there are number of diseases caused by fungi such as dermatitis, ringworm, atheleteâ€™s foot, aspergillosis, and mucormycosis [ 6, 7]. Essential oil from H. suaveolens shows strong antifungal activity against Aspergillus spp. ( A. flavus, A. parasiticus, A. niger, A. ochraceus, A. fumigatus), Saccharomyces cerevisiae, Mucor sp., Fusarium moniliforme, etc . [ 54].
